com.rivelbop.rivelworks.ui

Class Font

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rivelbop.rivelworks.ui.Font
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable

    public final class Font
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
    A bitmap font with the ability to draw to center.
    Author:
    David Jerzak (RivelBop)

                 java.lang.String text,

        Renders the provided String into the provided SpriteBatch.
        Parameters:
        batch - The sprite batch to render the font to.
        text - The text to render.
        x - The x-position of the text.
        y - The y-position of the text.

      • drawCenter

        public void drawCenter(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch,
                       java.lang.String text,
                       float x,
                       float y)
        Renders the provided String into the provided SpriteBatch based on its center.
        Parameters:
        batch - The sprite batch to render the font to.
        text - The text to render.
        x - The center x-position of the text.
        y - The center y-position of the text.

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Removes BITMAP_FONT from memory. Should be called if the object is no longer in use and not a part of an AssetManager.
        Specified by:
        dispose in interface com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
